Rulings.Edison: ● This card's effect can't be activated in the same Chain Link as the card itself being activated.
Rulings.Tengu: ● This card's effect can't be activated in the same Chain Link as the card itself being activated.

Rulings.Cat:
● 'All-Out Attacks' starts a Chain whenever a monster is Special Summoned, even if the monster is Special Summoned in Attack Position.
● Monsters that are Special Summoned face-down are also changed to Attack Position.
● If 'All-Out Attacks' is activated when a monster is Special Summoned, its effect isn't applied because it must already be applying at the time the monster is Special Summoned.
Rulings.TeleDAD:
● 'All-Out Attacks' starts a Chain whenever a monster is Special Summoned, even if the monster is Special Summoned in Attack Position.
● Monsters that are Special Summoned face-down are also changed to Attack Position.
● If 'All-Out Attacks' is activated when a monster is Special Summoned, its effect isn't applied because it must already be applying at the time the monster is Special Summoned.
Rulings.Gladiator:
● 'All-Out Attacks' starts a Chain whenever a monster is Special Summoned, even if the monster is Special Summoned in Attack Position.
● Monsters that are Special Summoned face-down are also changed to Attack Position.
● If 'All-Out Attacks' is activated when a monster is Special Summoned, its effect isn't applied because it must already be applying at the time the monster is Special Summoned.
Rulings.ReturnDAD:
● 'All-Out Attacks' starts a Chain whenever a monster is Special Summoned, even if the monster is Special Summoned in Attack Position.

Rulings.Base: 1. "All-Out Attacks" starts a Chain whenever a monster is Special Summoned, even if the monster is Special Summoned in Attack Position.\n2. Monsters that are Special Summoned face-down are also changed to face-up Attack Position.\n3. If "All-Out Attacks" is activated when a monster is Special Summoned, its effect is not applied because it must already be face-up on the field at the time the monster is Special Summoned.

PSCT.Edison: ① If a monster(s) is Special Summoned while this card is face-up on the field: Change it to Attack Position, also it must attack this turn, if able.
PSCT.Tengu: ① If a monster(s) is Special Summoned while this card is face-up on the field: Change it to face-up Attack Position, also it must attack this turn, if able.
